name: tsoa-deno-example
description: Example of building swagger-compliant REST APIs using TypeScript and Deno

scripts.serve: npm run build && deno run --watch --allow-net --allow-read --allow-ffi --config deno.json example/index.ts
scripts.watch: concurrently --names "TSOA,DENO" "nodemon -x tsoa-deno spec-and-routes -e ts,js,mjs,cjs,json --ignore **/routes.ts --ignore **/swagger.json" "npm run serve"
